easy.q: I have hands but cannot clap. I can tell you what time it is and where to go. What am I?
easy.hint: Look for something that measures time.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a three-letter word that changes when you add two letters.

hard.q: Three friends share a cake: A, B, and C. The cake has 12 slices. A takes exactly 1/3 of the slices, B takes half of the remaining, and C takes the rest. How many slices does C get?
hard.hint: Compute step by step: after A, then B, then C remains.
